javadoc:
Small class to hold the filename and line number info values from
 DWARF {@link DebugInfoEntry DIEs}.

methods.name: create
methods.comment:
Creates a new DWARFSourceInfo instance from the supplied DIEAggregate
 if the info is present, otherwise returns null;

params.name: diea
params.comment: DIEAggregate to query for source info

return.comment: new DWARFSourceInfo with filename:linenum info, or null if no info present in DIEA.

methods.name: getSourceInfoWithFallbackToParent
methods.comment:
Creates a new DWARFSourceInfo instance from the supplied DIEAggregate,
 falling back to the parent containing DIE record if the first record did not have any
 source info.

params.name: diea
params.comment: DIEAggregate to query for source info.

return.comment:
new DWARFSourceInfo with filename:linenum info, or null if no info
 present in the specified DIEA and its parent.

methods.name: getDescriptionStr
methods.comment:
Returns the source file and line number info attached to the specified DIEAggregate
 formatted as #getDescriptionStr(), or null if not present.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the source location info as a string formatted as "filename:linenum"
@return "filename:linenum"
methods.name: getDescriptionStr
methods.comment: Returns the source location info as a string formatted as "filename:linenum"

methods.javadoc:
Returns the source location info as a string formatted as "File: filename Line: linenum"
@return "File: filename Line: linenum"
methods.name: getDescriptionStr2
methods.comment: Returns the source location info as a string formatted as "File: filename Line: linenum"

name: DWARFSourceInfo
comment:
Small class to hold the filename and line number info values from
 DWARF DebugInfoEntry.
